thread.title: Staff very friendly and helpful. Beautiful hotel nicely located.
thread.title_full: Staff very friendly and helpful. Beautiful hotel nicely located. - Review of 1K Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: nabooru5
title: Staff very friendly and helpful. Beautiful hotel nicely located.
text: We only stayed one night but we loved our room and the service. We got our breakfast delivered to our room and it was perfect! The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely come back next year.
